data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ramalho, Laís V., Távora, Vladimir A., Tilbrook, Kevin J., Zágoršek, Kamil (2015): New species of Hippopleurifera (Bryozoa, Cheilostomata) from the Miocene Pirabas Formation, Pará state, Brazil. Zootaxa 3999 (1): 125-134, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3999.1.8
